document_data.name: Faith Healing Wand
document_data.mainbody: '''''Faith healing wand''''' was a spell used by [[cleric]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell was identical to ''[[convert wand]]'' with one key difference. When cast, this spell turned any [[wand]] into a ''[[wand of faith healing]]''.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
